00041 class Vector
00042 {
00043 
00044 public:
00045   Vector(Int d = 1, const Real& v = Real(0)) :d(d), owner(true) 
00046     {
00047 #ifdef DEBUG
00048       if (d==0) throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Can't construct a Vector of 0 dimension (debug only check)"));
00049 #endif
00050       a = new Real[d]; 
00051       for(Int i=0; i<d; i++)
00052         a[i]=v;
00053     }
00054   Vector(const Vector& v) :d(v.d), owner(true) 
00055     { a = new Real[d]; this->operator=(v); }
00056   Vector(const Vector3& v) :d(3), owner(true) 
00057     { a = new Real[d]; this->operator=(v); }
00058   Vector(const Vector4& v) :d(4), owner(true)
00059     { a = new Real[d]; this->operator=(v); }
00060   explicit Vector(Real array[], Int d) : d(d), owner(false), a(array) {}
00061   ~Vector() { if (owner) delete[] a; }
00062     
00063 
00064   Vector zero(Int d = 0) const 
00065     { if (d==0) return Vector(this->d); else return Vector(d); }
00066 
00067   void setZero() throw()
00068   { 
00069     clearMemory(a,d);
00070   }
00071 
00072   void resize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error)
00073   {
00074     if (d == this->d) return;
00075 
00076     Int oldd = this->d;
00077     Real* olda = a;
00078     a = new Real[d];
00079     
00080     base::copyMemory(olda,a,minimum(d,oldd));
00081     if (d > oldd)
00082       base::clearMemory(a+oldd, d-oldd);
00083 
00084     this->d = d;
00085     if (owner)
00086       delete[] olda;
00087     else
00088       owner=true;
00089   }
00090 
00091   void swap(Vector& v) 
00092   {
00093     Int td = d;
00094     Int towner = owner;
00095     Real* ta = a;
00096 
00097     d = v.d;
00098     owner = v.owner;
00099     a = v.a;
00100 
00101     v.d = td;
00102     v.owner = towner;
00103     v.a = ta;
00104   }
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108   Real& e(Int i) throw()
00109   { 
00110 #ifdef DEBUG
00111     if ((i < 1) || (i > d))
00112       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Vector index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00113 #endif 
00114     return a[i-1];
00115   }
00116 
00117   const Real& e(Int i) const throw()
00118   {
00119 #ifdef DEBUG
00120     if ((i < 1) || (i > d))
00121       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Vector index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00122 #endif 
00123     return a[i-1]; 
00124   }
00125 
00126   Real& at(Int i) throw(std::out_of_range)
00127   {
00128     if ((i < 1) || (i > d))
00129       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Vector index out of bounds"));
00130 
00131     return a[i-1];
00132   }
00133 
00134   const Real& at(Int i) const throw(std::out_of_range)
00135   {
00136     if ((i < 1) || (i > d))
00137       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("Vector index out of bounds"));
00138 
00139     return a[i-1];
00140   }
00141 
00142   Real& operator[](Int i)  
00143   { return e(i); }
00144 
00145   const Real& operator[](Int i) const
00146   { return e(i); }
00147 
00148   Vector& operator=(const Vector& src) throw()
00149   { 
00150     if (&src != this) {
00151       if (d != src.d) {
00152         if (owner) 
00153           delete[] a;
00154         else
00155           owner = true;
00156         d = src.d;
00157         a = new Real[d];
00158       }
00159 
00160       base::copyMemory(src.a,a,d);
00161     }
00162     return *this;
00163   }
00164 
00165   Vector& operator=(const Real& src) throw()
00166   { 
00167     if (d != 1) {
00168       if (owner)
00169         delete[] a;
00170       else
00171         owner=true;
00172       d = 1;
00173       a = new Real[d];
00174     }
00175     a[0]=src;
00176 
00177     return *this;
00178   }
00179 
00180   Vector& operator=(const Vector3& src) throw()
00181   { 
00182     if (d != 3) {
00183       if (owner)
00184         delete[] a;
00185       else
00186         owner=true;
00187       d = 3;
00188       a = new Real[d];
00189     }
00190 
00191     a[0] = src[1];
00192     a[1] = src[2];
00193     a[2] = src[3];
00194     
00195     return *this;
00196   }
00197 
00198   Vector& operator=(const Vector4& src) throw()
00199   { 
00200     if (d != 4) {
00201       if (owner)
00202         delete[] a;
00203       else
00204         owner=true;
00205       d = 4;
00206       a = new Real[d];
00207     }
00208 
00209     a[0] = src[1];
00210     a[1] = src[2];
00211     a[2] = src[3];
00212     a[3] = src[4];
00213     
00214     return *this;
00215   }
00216 
00217 
00218   bool operator==(const Vector& v) const throw()
00219   {
00220     if (&v == this) return true;
00221 
00222     if (d != v.d)
00223       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Vector can't be tested for equality with a Vector of different dimension"));
00224 
00225     bool equal=true;
00226     Real* s=v.a;
00227     Real* t=a;
00228     Int i=d;
00229     while(equal && (i-->0))
00230       equal = (*t++ == *s++);
00231 
00232     return equal;
00233   }
00234 
00235   bool operator!=(const Vector& v) const throw() { return !operator==(v); }
00236 
00237 
00238   bool equals(const Vector& v, Real epsilon = base::epsilon) const throw()
00239   {
00240     if (&v == this) return true;
00241 
00242     if (d != v.d)
00243       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Vector can't be tested for equality with a Vector of different dimension"));
00244 
00245     bool equal=true;
00246     Real* s=v.a;
00247     Real* t=a;
00248     Int i=d;
00249     while(equal && (i-->0))
00250       equal = base::equals(*t++,*s++,epsilon);
00251 
00252     return equal;
00253   }
00254 
00255 
00256   Int dimension() const throw()
00257   { return d; }
00258 
00259   Vector& negate() throw()
00260   {
00261     Real* t=a;
00262     Int i=d;
00263     while(i-->0)
00264       *t = -(*t++);
00265 
00266     return *this;
00267   }
00268 
00269   Real dot(const Vector& p) const throw()
00270   { 
00271     if (d != p.d)
00272       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Vector can't dot product with a Vector of different dimension"));
00273 
00274     Real* s=p.a;
00275     Real* t=a;
00276     Int i=d;
00277     Real dp=Real(0);
00278     while(i-->0)
00279       dp += ((*t++) * (*s++));
00280     
00281     return dp;
00282   }
00283 
00284 
00285   Vector& operator+=(const Vector& v2) throw()
00286   {
00287     if (d != v2.d)
00288       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Vector can't add a Vector of different dimension"));
00289 
00290     Real* s=v2.a;
00291     Real* t=a;
00292     Int i=d;
00293     while(i-->0)
00294       (*t++) += (*s++);
00295 
00296     return *this; 
00297   }
00298 
00299   Vector& operator-=(const Vector& v2) throw()
00300   {
00301     if (d != v2.d)
00302       throw std::invalid_argument(Exception("Vector can't subtract a Vector of different dimension"));
00303 
00304     Real* s=v2.a;
00305     Real* t=a;
00306     Int i=d;
00307     while(i-->0)
00308       (*t++) -= (*s++);
00309 
00310     return *this; 
00311   }
00312 
00313 
00314   Vector& operator*=(const Real& s) throw()
00315   {
00316     Real* t=a;
00317     Int i=d;
00318     while(i-->0)
00319       (*t++) *= s;
00320 
00321     return *this; 
00322   }
00323 
00324 
00325   Vector& operator/=(const Real& s)
00326   {
00327 #ifdef DEBUG
00328     if (s==0) throw invalid_argument(Exception("Can't divide by 0 (debug only check)"));
00329 #endif
00330     Real* t=a;
00331     Int i=d;
00332     while(i-->0)
00333       (*t++) /= s;
00334 
00335     return *this; 
00336   }

00339   Real* c_array() { return a; }
00340 
00341 
00342   Int d;      // dimension
00343   bool owner; // true if we allocated the array, false otherwise
00344   Real *a;    // array of elements

00350 inline Vector operator+(const Vector& v1, const Vector& v2) throw() // Addition
00351 { Vector r(v1); return r+=v2; }
00352 
00353 inline Vector operator-(const Vector& v1, const Vector& v2) throw() // Subtraction
00354 { Vector r(v1); return r-=v2; }
00355 
00356 inline Vector operator-(const Vector& v1) throw() // Negation
00357 { Vector r(v1); return r.negate(); }
00358 
00359 inline Vector operator*(const Vector& v1, const Real& s) throw() // Scalar multiplication
00360 { Vector r(v1); return r*=s; }
00361 
00362 inline Vector operator*(const Real& s, const Vector& v1) throw() // Scalar multiplication
00363 { Vector r(v1); return r*=s; }
00364 
00365 inline Vector operator/(const Vector& v1, const Real& s) // Scalar division
00366 { Vector r(v1); return r/= s; }
00367 
00368 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Vector& v) // Output
00369 {
00370   out << "(";
00371   for(Int i=0; i<v.d; i++) {
00372     out << v.a[i];
00373     if (i!=v.d-1) out << ",";
00374   }
00375   out << ")";
00376   return out;
00377 }
00378 
00379 inline Real dot(const Vector& v1, const Vector& v2) throw() // dot product v1.v2
00380 { Vector r(v1); return r.dot(v2); }
00381 
00382 inline Real operator*(const Vector& v1, const Vector& v2) // dot procuct v1.v2
00383 { return dot(v1,v2); }
